scripts.server:install: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('server')){process.exit(0);}else{console.log('Server directory not found, skipping server install');process.exit(0);}" && cd server && npm install
scripts.server:start: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('server')){process.exit(0);}else{console.log('Server directory not found');process.exit(1);}" && cd server && npm start
scripts.server:dev: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); if(fs.existsSync('server')){process.exit(0);}else{console.log('Server directory not found');process.exit(1);}" && cd server && npm run dev
scripts.railway:build: npm run build && npm run server:install
